System

Empowering Stories,
Building Futures

Care2Connect gives people experiencing homelessness the digital tools to market themselves for support—just like modern advertising, but for human connection and opportunity.

Tell Your StoryFind a ProfileGet Support

Our Mission

To empower individuals experiencing homelessness with the same powerful digital marketing tools that businesses use, helping them tell their story and connect with supporters who can help.

V1 - AVAILABLE NOW

Tell Your Story, Get Support

Our platform helps you create a professional fundraising presence in minutes

1. Record Your Story

Share your journey, goals, and what support you need—in your own voice

2. AI-Generated Draft

Our AI transforms your story into a professional GoFundMe-style pitch

3. Edit & Refine

Review and customize your draft to make it perfect

4. Get Your QR Code

Receive a scannable QR code for in-person donations via Stripe

V2 - IN DEVELOPMENT

The Future: AI-Powered Navigation

Coming soon: An intelligent assistant to help you navigate challenges and discover opportunities

AI Chat Assistant

Get personalized guidance for overcoming obstacles and accessing services

Coming in V2

Job Discovery

Find employment opportunities matched to your skills and location

Coming in V2

Resource Discovery

Real-time info on food giveaways, shelter availability, and support services

Coming in V2
